body: Doaa, Your window geometry is probably not well aligned with the wall and that's why this is not working for you. Curved surfaces do accept windows as you can see in the image below. Though is not based on a surface but rather on a percentage of the wall, but the principle is clear. Please check your geometry. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/NxE20jujyI9triQIKPD2fWt7ufKuFz5pU-Y*eptteWkm74rPKqk9L9PqNZhEyXO*2ARCdafCyBa8HuXgyKwvNtGtT4UYkFfo/Capture.JPG) -A.
